actions.name: Equinox
actions.description: Effect: The user's Physical and Special category moves include 20% of the user's SPATK and ATK respectively in damage calculation. In Gloomy Weather this increases to 35%. The user is considered Ghost Type for the effects of Gloomy Weather.

system.description: Effect: The user's Physical and Special category moves include 20% of the user's SPATK and ATK respectively in damage calculation. In Gloomy Weather this increases to 35%. The user is considered Ghost Type for the effects of Gloomy Weather.
